mapper.select: SELECT d.id, lineNo, noticeNo, distributDate, unit, area, unitID, hseHiddenLevel, hiddenCategory, nonconformity, hiddenDescription, hiddenDoc, reqCompleteDate, correctiveRequest, rectificationSituation, returnDoc, contractonPeople, completeDate, responsiblePersonId, responsiblePerson, copyPerson, responsibleDate, contractorApprove, contractorApproveDate, comfirmContent, verifyPerson, verifyDate, hsePassContent, verificationCondition, closePerson, closeDate, corApprovePerson, corApproveDate, ifSiteCorrection, isDel FROM checkAndDanger c, dangerList d WHERE c.checkId = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND c.dangerId = d.id
